channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Creating an already-completed asynchronous activity in C++/WinRT, part 6】在 C++/WinRT 中创建已完成的异步活动，第 6 部分
item.description: 【Let the conversion do the talking.】让转换来说话。

item.title: 【Azure Fluid Relay: Leveraging Azure Blob Storage to scale Git】Azure Fluid Relay：利用 Azure Blob 存储来扩展 Git
item.description: 【Learn how to leverage Git as a storage mechanism behind the globally available Azure Fluid Relay (AFR) service.】了解如何利用 Git 作为全球可用的 Azure Fluid Relay (AFR) 服务背后的存储机制。

item.title: 【.NET 9 Preview 6 is now available!】.NET 9 预览版 6 现已推出！
item.description: 【Try out the latest features in .NET 9 Preview 6 across the .NET runtime, SDK, libraries, ASP.NET Core, Blazor, and more!】跨 .NET 运行时、SDK、库、ASP.NET Core、Blazor 等尝试 .NET 9 Preview 6 中的最新功能！

item.title: 【Building a Safer Future – How NuGet is Tackling Software Supply Chain Threats】构建更安全的未来 - NuGet 如何应对软件供应链威胁
item.description: 【Despite significant technological progress in addressing complex security threats, the key to preventing the next attack lies in adhering to fundamental security principles. It’s essential to ensure the software ecosystem is secure, focusing on protecting .NET developers who design, build, and maintain the critical software we all use.】尽管在解决复杂的安全威胁方面取得了重大的技术进步，但防止下一次攻击的关键在于坚持基本的安全原则。确保软件生态系统的安全至关重要，重点是保护设计、构建和维护我们都使用的关键软件的 .NET 开发人员。

item.title: 【Creating an already-completed asynchronous activity in C++/WinRT, part 5】在 C++/WinRT 中创建已完成的异步活动，第 5 部分
item.description: 【Trying to fail more correctly.】尝试更正确地失败。

item.title: 【Making Visual Studio a bit more visual】让 Visual Studio 更加直观
item.description: 【Any web, desktop, or mobile developer works with images often. You reference them from C#, HTML, XAML, CSS, C++, VB, TypeScript, and even in code comments. Some images are local, and some exist online or on network shares, while others only exist as base64 encoded strings.】任何 Web、桌面或移动开发人员都经常使用图像。您可以从 C#、HTML、XAML、CSS、C++、VB、TypeScript 甚至代码注释中引用它们。有些图像是本地的，有些存在于在线或网络共享上，而其他图像仅以 base64 编码字符串存在。

item.title: 【Get Hands-On with Visual Studio and Azure: Live at Microsoft HQ this August!】亲身体验 Visual Studio 和 Azure：今年 8 月在 Microsoft 总部现场直播！
item.description: 【Visual Studio LIVE! Microsoft HQ 2024 August 5-9 | Microsoft Conference Center, Redmond, WA There’s still time to register, join us, get your questions answered, and bring back a wealth of knowledge and excitement to your teams! We’re close to selling out for next month’s conference,】视觉工作室上线！ Microsoft 总部 2024 年 8 月 5 日至 9 日 |华盛顿州雷德蒙德 Microsoft 会议中心 现在还有时间注册、加入我们、解答您的问题并为您的团队带回丰富的知识和兴奋！下个月的会议门票即将售完，

item.title: 【Creating an already-completed asynchronous activity in C++/WinRT, part 4】在 C++/WinRT 中创建已完成的异步活动，第 4 部分
item.description: 【Failing is easy. Failing correctly is hard.】失败很容易。正确地失败是很难的。

item.title: 【Introducing Python Function Choice Behavior: Streamlining AI Model Configuration】Python 函数选择行为简介：简化 AI 模型配置
item.description: 【  Introducing Function Choice Behavior Today, we’re excited to introduce the Function Choice Behavior, an enhancement over the existing Function Call Behavior. This new feature streamlines configuration and supports specifying multiple required functions, simplifying code and enhancing functionality. One significant advantage of Function Choice Behavior is its abstraction at the base PromptExecutionSettings level,】 介绍函数选择行为 今天，我们很高兴地介绍函数选择行为，它是对现有函数调用行为的增强。这一新功能简化了配置并支持指定多个所需功能，从而简化了代码并增强了功能。函数选择行为的一个显着优势是它在基本 PromptExecutionSettings 级别的抽象，

item.title: 【Announcing OData .NET 8 Release Candidate 1】宣布 OData .NET 8 候选版本 1
item.description: 【OData .NET 8.0 RC1 is now available, bringing numerous significant improvements to the following libraries: Microsoft.OData.Core Microsoft.OData.Edm Microsoft.Spatia Microsoft.OData.Client This is the final release candidate before the official launch of these libraries, scheduled for August 12th. Most of the planned features and changes are included in this release candidate and are ready for you to explore.】OData .NET 8.0 RC1 现已推出，为以下库带来了众多重大改进： Microsoft.OData.Core Microsoft.OData.Edm Microsoft.Spatia Microsoft.OData.Client 这是这些库正式发布之前的最终候选版本，预定8月12日。大多数计划的功能和更改都包含在此候选版本中，可供您探索。
